  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2790</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Holiday Celebrations around the World</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Feiertag-Feiern um die Welt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Célébrations de vacances autour du monde</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Celebrations do feriado em torno do mundo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Celebrazioni di festa intorno al mondo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εορτασμοί διακοπών σε όλο τον κόσμο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Celebraciones del día de fiesta alrededor del 
mundo</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A lesson plan for an activity where students learn about holiday celbrations in different countries and compareit to their own. Includes assessment rubric and some actual examples.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">oral expressin</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">culture</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Lektionplan für eine Aktivität, in der 
Kursteilnehmer über Feiertag celbrations in den unterschiedlichen 
Ländern und compareit zu ihren Selbst erlernen. Schließt 
Einschätzung Rubrik und einige tatsächliche Beispiele ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un plan de leçon pour une activité où les 
étudiants se renseignent sur les celbrations de vacances dans 
différents pays et le compareit à leurs propres. Inclut la 
rubrique d'évaluation et quelques exemples réels.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma planta da lição para uma atividade onde os 
estudantes aprendam sobre celbrations do feriado em países diferentes
e compareit ao seus próprios. Inclui o rubric da avaliação e 
alguns exemplos reais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un programma di lezione per un'attività dove gli
allievi imparano circa i celbrations di festa in paesi differenti ed 
il compareit ai loro propri. Include la rubrica di valutazione 
ed alcuni esempi reali.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα σχέδιο μαθήματος για μια δραστηριότητα όπου οι 
σπουδαστές μαθαίνουν για τα celbrations διακοπών στις 
διαφορετικές χώρες και compareit δικοί τους. Περιλαμβάνει
τη ρουμπρίκα αξιολόγησης και μερικά πραγματικά παραδείγματα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un plan de la lección para una actividad donde 
los estudiantes aprenden sobre celbrations del día de fiesta en 
diversos países y compareit sus los propios. Incluye la 
rúbrica del gravamen y algunos ejemplos reales.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mundexpressin</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schriftlicher Ausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kultur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expressin oral</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expression écrite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">culture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">expressin oral</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">cultura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">espressione scritta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">coltura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">προφορικό expressin</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">cultura</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
